notableFindings: DL3028 false positive on gem install -v version values
improvements: Fixed DL3028 gem version flag parsing

notableFindings: DL3018 false positive: inline comments in continuations parsed as package names; DL3006 false positive on stage aliases with ARG vars
improvements: Fixed lexer to strip comments in continuations
Fixed DL3006 to skip stage aliases

notableFindings: DL3006 false positive on internal stage names (gobuild, gorun)
DL3001 flags vim/nano in devcontainer (expected for dev images). DV1003 pipe to shell detected. Many DL3008 version pinning warnings.
DV1001 false positive: _FILE suffix ENV vars (Docker secrets file path convention) flagged as hardcoded secrets
improvements: Fixed DV1001 to skip _FILE suffix ENV vars (Docker secrets convention)

notableFindings: DL3001 flags 'mount' keyword in comments about BuildKit --mount. Heavy DL3018 apk version pinning warnings.
DV1006 false positive on distroless nonroot base images
improvements: Fixed DV1006 to skip nonroot distroless base images

notableFindings: Heavy DL3008 apt version pinning (68 findings). DL3004 sudo usage in builder stages. All findings appear legitimate.
DL3041 (77x) dnf version pinning. DV1001 correctly detected hardcoded COSIGN_PASSWORD=Harbor12345 in test Dockerfiles. Large repo with many Dockerfiles.
DV1006 false positive on chainguard/static base via stage alias (Dockerfile.distroless)
improvements: Fixed DV1006 to resolve stage aliases and recognize cgr.dev/chainguard/static

notableFindings: All findings appear legitimate. Heavy DL3008/DL3015 in contrib Dockerfiles.
Heavy DL3029 platform mismatch warnings (cross-compilation). All findings legitimate.
DL3001 false positive: BuildKit --mount=type=cache flagged as mount command
improvements: Fixed DL3001 to strip --mount= flags before command detection

notableFindings: Heavy dnf/apk version pinning. DV1003 curl|sh in cross-compile Dockerfile. All findings legitimate.
DL3001 false positive on --mount (same issue as envoy). DV2001/DV2008 apt-get update separation in RELEASING Dockerfiles. DV3008 git clone credential warning.
DV1001 correctly flags PGPASSWORD=password in test Dockerfile. DV1009 false positives on stage aliases and ARG vars.
improvements: Fixed DV1009 to skip stage aliases and ARG variable references

notableFindings: DV1009 reduced from 47 to 9 after fix (38 false positives on stage aliases/ARG vars eliminated). Heavy DL3008/DL3006/DL3018 version pinning.
improvements: Fixed DV1009 to skip stage aliases and ARG variable references

notableFindings: All findings legitimate. Small well-maintained Dockerfiles.
All findings legitimate. DEBIAN_FRONTEND as ENV (DV4007), apt-get cache issues, DV4012 consecutive COPY in multi-stage builds.
All findings legitimate. Base image uses ARG var (DL3006). Dockerfile.base is single-stage with build tools (DV1004).
All findings legitimate. Example Dockerfiles with deprecated MAINTAINER, unpinned pip packages, missing --no-cache-dir.
All findings legitimate. DL3045 COPY without WORKDIR, DV4012 consecutive COPY, DV1009 digest pinning recommendations.
DV1009 false positive: heredoc COPY <<EOF embedding Python code (from __future__, pathlib, packaging.utils) parsed as FROM instructions
improvements: Added heredoc syntax support to lexer - skips <<DELIM body content to prevent false FROM detection

notableFindings: Heavy DV4012 consecutive COPY (17x). DV1009 digest pinning (15x). All findings legitimate.
DV1001 correctly flags GITLAB_ROOT_PASSWORD in ENV. DL3001 flags kill command in RUN. Heavy DL3045 COPY without WORKDIR. All findings legitimate.
DV1001 correctly flags 34 intentional ARG AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=FAKE in test fixture. Heavy DV4012 consecutive COPY. All findings legitimate.
DV1003 curl|sh in installer scripts. Heavy DL3008 apt version pinning. DL3045 COPY without WORKDIR (20x). All findings legitimate.
All findings legitimate. Build/test Dockerfiles with expected issues (no USER, unpinned apt, COPY .).
SDK runtime Dockerfiles are minimal stubs (expected). PHP dev.Dockerfile has curl|sh and multi-stage issues. All findings legitimate.
DL3021 correctly flags COPY with 3 args where dest lacks trailing /. All findings legitimate.
DV4011 false positive on quoted absolute WORKDIR ("/app"). DL3000 also triggered (same root cause in DL3000 uses w.path which is OK).
improvements: Fixed DV4011 to strip surrounding quotes before checking absolute/relative paths
